main event: A military observer reported a white burning object descending over Atsugi, Japan on May 1, 1961.
interesting points: The sighting lasted approximately 30 seconds., The object was described as a white burning object with a short duration., There was a mention of similar observations by others., It was classified as a ground observation by military personnel., The record card was part of the U.S. Air Force's Project Blue Book.
witness description: military personnel from the control tower
